# MTLMathFloatingPointFunctions.precise

**Case**

An indication that Metal uses the precise version of the 32b floating-point math functions.

## Declaration

```swift
case precise
```

## Function sets

- **MTLMathFloatingPointFunctions.fast**: An indication that Metal uses the fast version of the 32b floating-point math functions.

items.description: An indication that Metal uses the fast version of the 32b floating-point math functions.
